p: Eight-week-old C57Bl6 male mice were purchased from the Animal Breeding Center of University of Campinas (Campinas, Brazil). IL-10 −/− mice were purchased from the Animal Facility of the School of Medicine of Ribeirão Preto/University of São Paulo (Ribeirão Preto, Brazil). All mice were maintained at 23 ± 2 °C under a 12:12 h light/dark cycle with access to water ad libitum.
